item.title: Portable Fire Extinguisher - 13 lb. Halon Bottle

numlitem.para: Inoperative fire extinguisher is tagged inoperative, removed from the installed location, and placed out of sight so it can not be mistaken for a functional unit, and
Main deck cargo compartment remains empty.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to Fire Extinguisher Bracket "Main Deck Portable Fire Extinguisher INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove and stow fire extinguisher in a secure area.
